text:
Crossposting from general,
since I figure this is where people wanting to procrastinate go.

attachments.fallback:
[January 24th, 2021 7:10 PM] jonas.isensee: Hi!

Anyone interested in data compression and JLD2 ?
I'm working on a PR to bring new compression libs to JLD2 along with better control.
<https://github.com/JuliaIO/JLD2.jl/pull/264>

Testing it out and API feedback would be valuable help!
attachments.text:
Hi!

Anyone interested in data compression and JLD2 ?
I'm working on a PR to bring new compression libs to JLD2 along with better control.
<https://github.com/JuliaIO/JLD2.jl/pull/264>

Testing it out and API feedback would be valuable help!

elements.text:
Crossposting from general,
since I figure this is where people wanting to procrastinate go.

text: We should also look into adding these in HDF5

elements.text: We should also look into adding these in HDF5

text: Blosc and Zlib already work with HDF5.jl (the c libraries come bundled with the hdf5 binary)

elements.text: Blosc and Zlib already work with HDF5.jl (the c libraries come bundled with the hdf5 binary)

text:
I'm not sure whether you could add new compression libraries from julia.
It might be better to add the corresponding filter plugins as binaries.

elements.text:
I'm not sure whether you could add new compression libraries from julia.
It might be better to add the corresponding filter plugins as binaries.
